p: Essential oils from the following six plants were used in this experiment: lemon verbena ( Aloysia triphylla L’Hèr. Britton), cinnamon ( Cinnamomum zeylanicum J. Presl), lemongrass ( Cymbopogon citratus (DC.) Stapf), litsea ( Litsea cubeba (Lour.) Pers.), peppermint ( Mentha piperita), and clove ( Syzygium aromaticum (L.) Merr. and L.M. Perry). All EOs, purchased by the producer (FLORA ®, Pisa, Italy), were maintained at 4 °C in dark glass vials until their employment.
